sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含事物或人的"外表，容貌"之意。
means: appearance ：普通用词，着重由总体产生的印象。
look ：普通用词，多用复数，可与appearance换用，但较口语化。
aspect ：书面用词，突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"方面"之意。
means: phase ： 指可以对事物进行观察或描述或考虑的任何方面。
aspect ： 着重以特定观点对事物进行观察或考虑。
side可与aspect和phase换用，但更着重构成事物全貌的一个或多个方面。
angle ： 专指从某一角度去观察、考虑事物的某个方面。

word_mean: 群落在一年中因各种植物的不同物候进程而在不同季节里表现出来的不同外貌。

sentence.Network_en: Antonio has a contagious enthusiasm for the beautiful aspect of food.
sentence.Network_cn: 安东尼奥对食品赏心悦目这一方面的热情非常有感染性。

sentence.Network_en: The existence of an emotional undertow is an aspect of all politics.
sentence.Network_cn: 具有情绪感召力是所有政治的一个方面。

sentence.Network_en: She has already expressed her dissatisfaction with this aspect of the policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对政策的这一方面已经表达了不满。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (denoting the action or a way of looking at something): from Latin aspectus, from aspicere 'look at', from ad- 'to, at' + specere 'to look'

entry.def: An aspect of something is one of the parts of its character or nature.

example.ex: Climate and weather affect every aspect of our lives...
example.tran: 气候和天气影响着我们生活的方方面面。

example.ex: He was interested in all aspects of the work here...
example.tran: 他对这里工作的所有方面都感兴趣。

entry.def: The aspect of a building or window is the direction in which it faces.

example.ex: The house had a south-west aspect.

entry.def: If something begins to have a new aspect, it begins to have a new appearance or quality.

example.ex: Our journey had taken on a new aspect. The countryside was no longer familiar...
example.tran: 我们所到之地呈现出一派新景象。乡村变得不再熟悉。

example.ex: The snowy street, like the church, assumed a dumb, lifeless aspect.
example.tran: 积雪覆盖的街道就像教堂一样，显得沉闷、毫无生气。

entry.def: In grammar, aspect is the way that a verb group shows whether an activity is continuing, is repeated, or is completed. For example, in 'They were laughing', the verb is in the progressive aspect and shows that the action was continuing.

means.word_mean: 1. a distinct feature or element in a problem;

sentences.sentence: "he studied every facet of the question"

means.word_mean: 3. the visual percept of a region;

sentences.sentence: "the most desirable feature of the park are the beautiful views"

means.word_mean: 4. the beginning or duration or completion or repetition of the action of a verb
5. the expression on a person's face;

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

Sentence.sentence: Human control of fire goes back far enough (over a million years) that evolution could have produced a genetic leaning towards fire as a central aspect of human life.
It does not deal with any aspect of city life in depth.
There are a few aspects about gender role formation which social learning theories fail to explain.

Smith has written a breezy guidebook, with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity - parks, say, or the various schemes that have been put forward over the years for building the perfect city

sentences.en: The training program covers every aspect of the job.
sentences.cn: 训练计划的范围包括了这种工作的各个方面。

sentences.en: The house has a north-facing aspect.

means.word_mean: 面貌, 模样, 神态

sentences.en: He is a man of enormous size and terrifying aspect.
sentences.cn: 他是一个面目狰狞的彪形大汉。

jushi.english: We should consider the plan in its various aspects.
jushi.chinese: 我们要从各方面来考虑这项计划。

jushi.english: What do you find is the most worrying aspect of this election result?
jushi.chinese: 对于这次选举结果，你认为什么方面是最令人担心的？

jushi.english: We must consider each aspect of this plan.
jushi.chinese: 我们必须考虑到这一计划的每一方面。
